$Header$
2006-05-15
David Jones, Ravenbrook Limited
drj@ravenbrook.com


Third Party Resources


1. INTRODUCTION

This document records the use of 3rd party resources and materials that
are distributed with the release.

This document is Intuwave confidential.


2. SCHEDULE OF RESOURCES

- test/mnj/lua/LoaderTest2.luc is derived from the PUC-Rio Lua 5.1
  distribution.
- test/mnj/lua/ChunkSpy.lua is from Kein-Hong Man's ChunkSpy, used under
  his MIT style license.  See http://luaforge.net/projects/chunkspy/
- Other tests are (possibly derived from) portions of the Lua
  test-suite, http://www.inf.puc-rio.br/~roberto/lua/lua5.1-tests.tar.gz
- test/mnj/lua/speed/ contains Lua tests scripts from The Computer
  Language Shootout [1], used under their modified BSD license [2].
- lib/j2meunit.jar is from j2meunit project at
  http://j2meunit.sourceforge.net/.  It's licensed under the Common
  Public License Version 1.0 (which is a bit long for my liking).

A. REFERENCES

[1] Computer Language Shootout, http://shootout.alioth.debian.org/
[2] Computer Language Shootout's Modified BSD license,
  http://shootout.alioth.debian.org/gp4/miscfile.php?file=license&title=Revised%20BSD%20license


B. HISTORY

2006-05-15  DRJ  Created.
2006-07-06  DRJ  ChunkSpy, j2meunit, added.
2006-07-21  DRJ  Lua tests added.
